This chunk of code is part of the `NotifyPanel` class initialization, where radio buttons for different notify severity levels are created. Specifically, this section configures the "Info", "Debug", and "Spam" severity options within the severity frame, allowing users to set the desired severity threshold for a selected notify category.

value = NSInfo,

                                        command = self.setActiveSeverity)
        self.infoSeverity.pack(fill = X)
        self.debugSeverity = Radiobutton(severityFrame, text = 'Debug',
                                         justify = LEFT, anchor = W,
                                         value = NSDebug,
                                         variable = self.severity,
                                         command = self.setActiveSeverity)
        self.debugSeverity.pack(fill = X)
        self.spamSeverity = Radiobutton(severityFrame, text = 'Spam',
                                        justify = LEFT, anchor = W,
                                        value = NSSpam,
                                        variable = self.severity,
                                        command = self.setActiveSeverity)
        self.spamSeverity.pack(fill = X)
